name: Hold The Line (itch) (ZidixMalock)
description:
A Turn Based Tower Defense RPG from a 2.5D perspective.

While facing an onslaught of slimes, you're challenged to strategize and outmaneuver your foes. New enemies will challenge you and force you to adapts as the levels progress. 

Each one of the three unique characters have 4 Actions at their disposal. Each ones have their own strengths and restrictions. If you think ahead and use each move wisely, you can surmount even the most difficult of odds.

So show them your moves, go out guns blazing, and blow them away!

Hold down the fort.

Hold your ground.

Hold the Line!

Controls:

Right click to cancel actions and movement.

Arrow Keys and WASD to move around the camera. Look a the map from different angles!
